# stat5730covid19-dashboard

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is an example COVID-19 dashboard for STAT 5730 based on R Shiny. It requires the following 
R packages:

- shiny
- maps
- tidyverse
- RcppRoll
- [stat5730covid19](github.com/vqv/stat5730covid19)
